creator: rob@lasers.org
text:
Animated cursors will not work with the current settings in the conf file magic
Animated windows Cursors extension .ani  have in the header "RIFF" as the first 
4 bytes, which magic identifies as  

#                                       Microsoft RIFF
0       string          RIFF            audio/unknown

and will generate a Internal Server Error

This only effects MS IE browsers as far as I know as it is the only browser 
that allows for cursor changes in the STYLE tag

I have only tested with 1.3.24, but checked the magic file in 1.3.27 and it 
contains the same reference

Commenting out the Line will allow it to work.
